column4: where is the file that contains the list of installed packages? I am just going to try and remove it from there manually
if you remove it, dpkg won't function
if you remove it, dpkg won't function, but i think the file your looking for is /var/lib/dpkg/status
yes. i've had people do that before. have to be careful though. make a backup of the file first for sure. it's --> /var/lib/dpkg/status
